title: How to order books from the publisher for inmates - Quora

response.answer_text: First, although there are some standard policies that apply, check with the prison to see what specific policies you must adhere to. Assuming the policies are standard, here’s what you do. Get the inmates name, prison identification number, prison name and prison address.Contact the publisher and let them know that you want to order specific titles and have them sent to the inmate with the information in step 1.Pay for the book.Following those steps, the publisher will send the books to the inmate. One note is that most prisons will not let you send a book directly to an inmate, instead it must come directly from a publisher.
